Hello Cantera-Users,
I'm running Cantera on a windows-machine and I would like to compile 
Fluent-udf together with Cantera. So far I didn't figure out how to set 
up the makefile correctly. The posted samples work only on linux-
machines. Can anybody assist me? Thank you very much in advance.

Regards 
    Albrecht
